description: Marc and Topher are so comfortable and affectionate in this live show you can tell they are real life friends and fuck buddies. They talk about their latest scenes with Hot House and their escapades at the hotel during the shoot. Apparently Topher sent Marc a text saying that he was coming by his room and Marc answered the door buck naked 'with his balls hanging out.' After some good natured joking around and wrestling they get down to what they love to do best: sucking cock. Both guys are hung and equally talented at giving head but when Marc goes down deep on Topher, Topher tells him 'Any time you offer to suck my dick I'll always say yes.' Can you blame him?
title: Marc Dylan And Topher DiMaggio, Scene #01
